name: Cards of the Swords of Protection (Duel Links Skill)
text:
Yami Yugi / Skill
[ SKILL ACTIVATION ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ SKILL EFFECT ]
You can use any of the following Skills once per Duel.
● Send 1 "Swords of Revealing Light" from your field that has been activated during this turn to the Graveyard and draw 1 card.
● During your Draw Phase, instead of drawing, you can send 1 "Swords of Revealing Light" from your field to the GY; Search your Deck for any card, reveal it to your opponent, and add it to your hand.

(This Skill has been adapted to work in our format, and it attempts to replicate its function in Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links.)
